name: FNF - Vs. Beach Brother Full Week
name_original: FNF - Vs. Beach Brother Full Week
description:
This is a mod for the fan-made character The Brother, by Squizzle Dizzle. He is both a lifeguard and the brother of the girlfriend. 

This mod adds: 

A New Week With Three New Custom Songs

A New Custom Character

Custom Background

Custom Dialogue 

Edited Title Screen

And Fully Animated Cutscenes!

This guy's not messing around, he's not going to let you be with his sister until you've proven you're worth it
